full of people or things: The hall was packed for the opening lecture.
-packed
full of the thing mentioned: a vitamin-packed health drink an action-packed film
be packed with sth
to contain a lot of something: be packed with information/news/advice The latest edition is packed with useful information. Our jams are packed with flavour.
